result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Anthony Larson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Pay as required by Clerk of Courts.
Pay as required by Clerk of Courts.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Anthony Larson

records.addlTxt:
9:32 AM Defendant Michael Anthony Larson in court, in custody.  Attorney John E Swanberg in court for Michael Anthony Larson.  Attorney Chad C La Lor in court for State of Wisconsin. State indicates that there is an agreement in the case. The repeater enhancer would be stricken. The defendant would plead to the amended count. Sentence of 85 days jail with 64 days credit, time served; $25 fine plus costs. 
Defendant pleads guilty. Attorney Swanberg stipulates to a factual basis. Court accepts the defendant's plea. Court finds that the defendant's pleas have been knowingly and voluntarily made. Defendant is found guilty and judgment of conviction is entered. State makes statement about sentencing. Defendant has lengthy misdemeanor criminal history, believes recommendation is reasonable. Attorney Swanberg indicates that he has served a substantial amount of jail time for the offense. 
Court orders 85 days jail with 64 days credit, time served; $25 fine plus costs. 120 days to pay.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael Anthony Larson
Current: PO Box 25265, Albuquerque, NM 87125 United States  (Effective: 08-31-2022)
Prior: 4925 Sorrell Avenue, Golden Valley, MN 55422 United States

ADDRESS INFO for Michael Anthony Larson
Current: 4925 Sorrell Avenue, Golden Valley, MN 55422 United States  (Effective: 07-08-2022)
Prior: Homeless, Superior, WI 54880
No contact with Kwik Trip stores.

3:39 PM Prosecuting attorney Chad C La Lor in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael Anthony Larson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Ryan Anthony Reid in court for Michael Anthony Larson. Defendant's address confirmed. Attorney/Defendant acknowledges receipt of the complaint, waives a formal reading and enters a plea(s) of not guilty. State asks for $500 cash. No contact with Kwik Trip stores. Notes that the defendant has a FTA in this case after being given bail slip with court date. Recites defendant's prior criminal history, FTAs, and probation revocations. Attorney Reid indicates he resides in group home in Golden Valley and had previously resided in Douglas county with his family. Asks for signature bond or up to $200 cash bond. 

Court orders $500 cash. No contact with Kwik Trip stores. Court quashes warrant.
Status conference scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 09:30 am.

01:44 PM Defendant Michael Anthony Larson not in court.  Peter James Marvin Kruger appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court acknowledges citation number 22FO61. State indicates defendant was given a release to appear slip to appear today and defendant did sign it. State requests warrant to issue and would like Douglas County only. Court grants State's request. 
Court finds defendant guilty on 22FO61 and defendant has 60 days to pay fine $162.50.
